title: #272 - Peter Kropotkin Pt. 2: Mutual Aid
itunes:title: #272 - Peter Kropotkin Pt. 2: Mutual Aid
description: Now that we know who Kropotkin was, let's spend part two discussing what he was all about. That involves some pretty detailed discussions of various anarchist frameworks during which Connor's arguments get totally freaking dunked on by a long-dead Russian intellectual. Hope you're ready to start a revolution! Because it's coming, baby!
